transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Ha sir, Himanshu baat kar raha hu sir aapne bola tha do din mein bataoge IndiaMART se.

Executive: Abhi confirm nahi hua hai mujhse.

Customer: Kya?

Executive: Boss bahar gaye rahe hain, abhi confirm nahi hua hai.

Customer: Sir, 1 tarikh se hamara jo lead jo hai na sir allocation wo 30% kam ho jayega. Hmm. 1 tarikh se jo bhi hai na charge dete hai agar abhi agar main 58 category mein preferred mein aapka 58 valid de raha hu to next 30% baat aisa hai Himanshu ji main utna force boss ko nahi kar sakta paise unko lagane hai.

Customer: Ha nahi force ka ho raha hai sir ek mahine baad baat kar raha hu aapse.

Executive: Ha wahi main bol raha hu main utna force nahi kar paunga unko ki aap lagao ye lagao abhi.

Executive: Theek hai. Boss ko bata diya hai ab unka decision hai maine do teen baar reminder bhi dal diya.

Executive: Theek hai. Ab unka decision hai main bar bar unko ye nahi follow up nahi kar sakta hu uske liye.

Executive: Main ek bar jaise hi confirmation aayega main ek bar aur remind karaunga agar aata hai to fir aage baat karenge. Theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about subscription confirmation.

- Lead allocation will decrease by 30%.



Resolution:

- Executive informed boss is out of town.

- Executive will remind once confirmation is received.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will remind once confirmation is received.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, lead allocation, confirmation
